Recommendations: 1. Intensify the documentation process in the formulation and review of the research agenda of the program. Participation of various stakeholders, both internal and external, will be expected and must be fully noted

2. The administration may exert more effort to encourage the core faculty of the program to be more productive in research. Incentives and other packages beneficial to the researchers may be made more attractive and flexible.
3. If possible, establish linkages with intemational organization like Japan Society for the Promotional Science (JSPS) for funding support and assistance specifically for research and development.
4. Utilization of research outputs for institutional development, improvements of instruction, and extension purposes must be fully documented.
5. MOA/Terminal reports should be updated and made available upon completion of the project.
